exec: // This is a Postman post-request request test script.
// The Javascript code below is executed AFTER a response is
// received by the Postman client.  This code can do all sorts
// Parse the JSON response body and save the result in the resp variable
// Set an environemnt variable based on the value in the response JSON
// This is a Postman post-request request test script.
// The Javascript code below is executed AFTER a response is
// received by the Postman client.  This code can do all sorts
// Parse the JSON response body and save the result in the resp variable
// Set an environemnt variable based on the value in the response JSON

item.name: Step 3: Get BIG-IP Base MAC Address

exec: // This is a Postman post-request request test script.
// The Javascript code below is executed AFTER a response is
// received by the Postman client.  This code can do all sorts
// Parse the JSON response body and save the result in the resp variable
// Set an environemnt variable based on the value in the response JSON
postman.setNextRequest("[BIGIP A] Check Root User Enabled");
f5_poll_until_all_tests_pass("[BIGIP A] Check Root User Enabled");
postman.setNextRequest("[BIGIP A] Set admin User Password");
postman.setNextRequest("[BIGIP A] Set root User Password");
postman.setNextRequest("[BIGIP B] Set admin User Password");
postman.setNextRequest("[BIGIP B] Set root User Password");

item.name: [BIGIP A] Add BIGIP-B Device to CMI Trust

exec: f5_poll_until_all_tests_pass("[BIGIP A] Change Traffic Group to use HA Order Failover");

item.name: [BIGIP A] Change Traffic Group to use HA Order Failover
[BIGIP A] Get Traffic Group Failover States
[BIGIP B] Failover Traffic Group to BIGIP A
[BIGIP A] Verify Traffic Group Failover States

exec: f5_poll_until_all_tests_pass("[BIGIP A] Create Internal Floating Self IP");

body.raw:
[
  {
    "op":"add",
    "path":"/Tenant1/HTTPS_Service",
      "value": {
            "class": "Application",
            "template": "https",
            "serviceMain": {
                "class": "Service_HTTPS",
                "virtualAddresses": [
                    "10.1.20.122"
                ],
                "snat": "auto",
                "pool": "Pool1",
                "profileHTTP": { "use": "HTTP_Profile" },
                "profileCompressionHTTP": { "use": "HTTP_Compress" },
                "serverTLS": "TLS_Offload"
            },
            "Pool1": {
                "class": "Pool",
                "monitors": [
                    "http"
                ],
                "members": [
                    {
                        "servicePort": 8001,
                        "serverAddresses": [
                            "10.1.10.100"
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "servicePort": 8002,
                        "serverAddresses": [
                            "10.1.10.101"
                        ]
                    }

                ]
            },
      		"linux_high": {
			"class": "WAF_Policy",
    		"url": "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/f5devcentral/f5-automation-labs/master/files/asm-policies/demo-asm-policy-linux-high.xml",
			"ignoreChanges": true
			},
            "HTTP_Profile": {
                "class": "HTTP_Profile",
                "adcName": "SuperNetOpsClass1",
                "xForwardedFor": true
            },
            "HTTP_Compress": {
                "class": "HTTP_Compress",
                "cpuSaver": true,
                "cpuSaverHigh": 70,
                "cpuSaverLow": 50,
                "selective": true

{
